modName: Inn Keepers Don't Escort - SSE - DELETED
summary:
Inn keepers no longer escort the player to his or her bed.
An updated, potential safer version of this mod:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66391
descriptionHtml:
I liked the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66391/?]Original mod[/url], but there was a concern about deleted dialog topics in that mod's post pages.
I un-deleted them and set a condition so that they never play (Checks if the player character exists).
Also updated for SSE (Form 44), since that's what I use.
author: Zaelesh and Coldrifting
